entry.title: about
entry.content:
About me

Welcome! I am Yuanlong Zhou（周元龙/Ryan）,

a self-motivated graduate student pursuing a Master’s degree of Computer Science at Texas A&M University in USA, with solid knowledge in both computer and finance fundamentals, and abundant hands-on experience in Full-Stack DevOps (Web/Mobile/PC), Cloud Services, Microservices (SaaS), Data Analysis and Processing, Game Development, and Finance.

I am also

  • a passionate programmer elevating expertise in technical solutions and a prospective learner with great potential.
  • a creative and innovative VR/AR game developer, releasing several commercial works on Steam.
  • a group leader and a pivotal participant in academic and industrial projects, awarded with a number of prizes.
  • actively seeking opportunities to contribute my extensive intelligence and proven skillsets to technology companies.

     

 

Specialization:
Full-Stack Development (Web/Mobile/PC), Cloud Service (AWS), Machine Learning (AI), Database (SQL, NoSQL), System Architecture, Data Structure and Algorithm, Computer Graphics, VR/AR Game & Animation, etc.

Education:
2023/08-2024/12: M.Sc in Computer Science, Texas A&M University, USA.
2019/09-2023/07: B.Eng. in Computer Science & B.Ec. in Financial Engineering (Dual-degree), Sichuan University, China.
GPA: 4.0 / 4.0 (Graduate), 3.8 / 4.0 (Undergraduate)
Toefl: 106 (29/26/23/28) GRE: 324 (155/169/4)

Tel (WhatsApp): +1 (979)-344-4239
E-mail: ryanbowz@outlook.com We-chat: zh-agon
Address: 302 Ball Street, College Station, Texas, 77840

Identity: F1 student visa, requiring sponsorship for CPT/OPT (STEM 24-month extension) and H-1B status in future.

Skillsets:
Languages: Mandarin (Native), English (Fluent).
Values: Proactive, Ownership, Work Ethic, Organizational, Learning Agility.
Coding Languages: C/C++, Java, Python, C#, Go, Swift, SQL, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, OpenGL, Perl, VBA, R, SAS, Rust.
Software: Adobe Acrobat, MS Office (Word, Excel macros, PPT), Google Drive, GitHub, Unity3D, Matlab, CAD, SPSS, VMware, Stata, Tibco, Oracle, CRM, CMake, Gradle, 3dsMax, Linux (Red Hat, Ubuntu), IDEA, PyCharm, Visual Studio.

Core Courses:
Object-Oriented Programming (C++, Java, Python), System Design, AI and Deep Learning, Computer Animation, Mobile Wireless Network, Digital Logic and Digital System, Multimedia Technology, Computer Organization, Data Structure and Algorithm Analysis, Computer Graphics, Discrete Mathematics, Operating System, Microcomputer System and Interface, The Art of Game, Computer Network, Advanced Software Engineering, Web Front-end: H5 + CSS3 + JS, Database System, Principle of Compiler, Computer Architectures, Linear Algebra, Calculus, Probability Statistics, Discrete Mathematics.
Political Economy, Accounting, Microeconomics, Public Finance, Macroeconomics, Statistics, Finance, Corporate Finance, Econometrics, Monetary economics and monetary policy, International Economics, Financial Engineering, International Trade, Financial Econometrics, E-finance, Politics Economy and Diplomacy of European Union, Engineering Project Investment and Financing, Financial Risk Management, Security Investment.

 

Quick Jump: portfolio experience certificates blog
If you want to learn more about me, you can read corresponding page or refer to my Resume/CV.

Last Update: 2024/01/05
